tasks.instruction:
Implement Phase 8.5 Authentication System:
1. Create login page (/login) with glassmorphism design
2. Create register page (/register) with glassmorphism design  
3. Implement JWT authentication flow
4. Add protected route middleware
5. Create user profile management
6. Integrate with backend API endpoints
Use the exact glassmorphism design specifications from the implementation guide, ensuring pixel-perfect match with reference images.
